data.title: friendly stops between Niagara Falls and Sharon (Connecticut)
data.meta_description: Find dog-friendly and cat-friendly stops along the way from Niagara Falls to Sharon (Connecticut).
data.text:
Day 1

11:00 am start in Niagara Falls

drive for about 1.5 hours

12:33 pm Rochester (New York)

stay for about 1 hour

and leave at 1:33 pm

drive for about 53 minutes

2:26 pm Seneca Falls

stay for about 1 hour

and leave at 3:26 pm

drive for about 1.5 hours

4:55 pm Marathon (New York)

stay overnight and leave the next day around 11:00 am

day 1 driving ≈ 4 hours

find more stops

Day 2

11:00 am leave from Marathon (New York)

drive for about 1.5 hours

12:16 pm eat at Brewery Ommegang

stay for about 1 hour

and leave at 1:16 pm

drive for about 1.5 hours

2:35 pm Woodstock (New York)

stay for about 1 hour

and leave at 3:35 pm

drive for about 50 minutes

4:26 pm arrive in Sharon (Connecticut)

stay at Sharon Motor Lodge

day 2 driving ≈ 3.5 hours
